travelHistory: Traveled to or been present in Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Somalia, Sudan, Syria, or Yemen on or after March 1, 2011
dualNationality: National of or dual national with Cuba, Iran, Iraq, North Korea, Sudan, or Syria
requirements: E-passport with electronic chip required for passports issued on or after October 1, 2006
Cannot extend stay or change status
Cannot be used for study or employment
